name: Bombwatch for ATARI ST(E)
description:
Bombwatch V0.92 Beta

This game has been written in Gfa Basic
and should work on ST and STE Machines
with 1MB in low res.

Bombwatch is similar to Minesweeper with some slight modifications.

Features:

4 different Designs (Press 1-4 in game)

Choose between 6 difficulty levels.

Mines are replaced with Atari Bombs.

First Square will be marked with a X

Press h for Helpmoves (limited)

Earn new Helmoves with every won Game.

Highscores will be saved.
